mapper.sql: PAY_INFO_ID as payInfoId, USER_INFO_ID as userInfoId, OPERATOR_INFO_ID as operatorInfoId, PAY_AMOUNT as payAmount, CHANNEL as channel, PAY_DETAIL_ID as payDetailId, BIZ_TYPE as bizType, BIZ_ID as bizId, BIZ_PROCESSED as bizProcessed, STATUS as status, STATUS_HISTORY as statusHistory, TIME_START as timeStart, TIME_EXPIRE as timeExpire, REFUND_STATUS as refundStatus, REFUNDED_PRICE as refundedPrice, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, PAY_SUCCESS_TIME as paySuccessTime, REFUND_APPLY_TIME as refundApplyTime, REFUND_SUCCESS_TIME as refundSuccessTime, QUERY_TIME as queryTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pay_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pay_info (USER_INFO_ID, OPERATOR_INFO_ID, PAY_AMOUNT, CHANNEL, PAY_DETAIL_ID, BIZ_TYPE, BIZ_ID, BIZ_PROCESSED, STATUS, STATUS_HISTORY, TIME_START, TIME_EXPIRE, REFUND_STATUS, REFUNDED_PRICE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAY_SUCCESS_TIME, REFUND_APPLY_TIME, REFUND_SUCCESS_TIME, QUERY_TIME) values (#{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operatorInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizProcessed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundedPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paySuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{refundSuccessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{queryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
